name: Extirpate Zombie: Rescue Perso
description:
Extirpate Zombie: Rescue Person City is one of the top games that blends the boundaries of zombie shooting games with a gun. A city hunter becomes a zombie killer in this zombie shooter game of a zombie hunter.

Features:
- Real 3D environments, with different tasks.
- Experience 3D shooting as a zombie hunter.
- Kill zombies in with epic weapons.
- Smooth zombie assault sniper action.
- Optimized Graphics.
